name: GameNumber027
description:
"How did you get in here? I guess that's not a question to ask right now since you're already here. If you look down, you'll see the tool. Call it - The Connector. It connects things, imagine that. I'd wish you luck but your probably don't need it. I'll see you at the end."

Left Controller

  • Grip - Teleport
  • Touchpad/Joystick - Snap Rotate

Right Controller

  • Grip - Grab/Interact
  • Touchpad/Joystick - Snap Rotate
  • Trigger - Tag Object (If Tool is held.)

Other Controls

  • ESC to Quit

Special Thanks

  • My boy El Ocho for making the stone assets.

Additional Assets:

  • Tool/Blaster - http://quaternius.com
  • Grid Textures - https://kenney.nl/
  • Sound Effects - https://kenney.nl/

Supports OpenVR and Oculus HMDs
